completion: Bot banane ke liye @BotFather se contact karo. /newbot command use karo aur apna bot name aur username set karo.
Token bot ki unique ID hoti hai. @BotFather se milta hai. Isse bot control karte hain.
Render, Railway, ya Heroku par deploy karo. Webhook set karo. Free hosting use karo.
Webhook Telegram ko batata hai ki bot kahan hosted hai. HTTPS URL chahiye hota hai.

prompt: User: Bot mein error aa raha hai
completion: Logs check karo. API key sahi hai? Code mein syntax error to nahi? Debug karo.
Main theek hun! Aap kaise hain?
Aaj thoda cloudy hai. Barish ka chance hai.
Sab badhiya! Kya plan hai aaj?
Abhi 3 baje hain. Chai peene ka time ho gaya!
Main yahan hun, aapki help ke liye ready hun!
Python ek programming language hai. Easy to learn, powerful hai. Web apps, AI, sab banate hain.
API ek service hai jo data exchange karti hai. Jaise weather API, payment API.
Database data store karne ka system hai. Jaise user info, messages sab save karta hai.
Server computer hai jo 24x7 online rehta hai. Websites, apps host karta hai.

Completion: Pehle logic samjho, phir step by step likho. Practice karo, errors se seekho.
